com.pax.us.pay.ui.constant.entry

Class SecurityEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pax.us.pay.ui.constant.entry.SecurityEntry

  • public final class SecurityEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    define Activity for SECURITY

    Secure UI need return location information of input box.
    Include EntryRequest.PARAM_X,EntryRequest.PARAM_Y,EntryRequest.PARAM_HEIGHT and EntryRequest.PARAM_WIDTH

        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_INPUT_ACCOUNT

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_INPUT_ACCOUNT
        Activity Action: Input Account
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.INPUT_ACCOUNT"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE - is trans name.
        Type: String
        Example: "CREDIT SALE"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE - is transaction mode.
        Type: String
        See TransMode for details

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT -
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_MERCHANT_NAME - is merchant name.
        Type: String
        Used when multi-merchant feature is enabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_CURRENCY - is currency type.
        Type: String
        Default value: CurrencyType.USD

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TOTAL_AMOUNT - is total amount
        Type: Long

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_SWIPE -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_INSERT -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_TAP -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_MANUAL -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_APPLEPAY -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_GOOGLEPAY -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_SAMSUNGPAY -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_NFCPAY -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_SCAN -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_LASER_SCAN -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_CONTACTLESS_LIGHT -
        Type: Boolean.
        True is enabled. False is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PAN_STYLES -
        Type: String.
        If value is PanStyles.NEW_PAN, prompt "Please Enter New Card Number".
        Else, prompt "Please Enter Card Number".
        For GIFT/LOYALTY Replace/Merge transaction use.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_X - is X coordinate of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_Y - is Y coordinate of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_WIDTH - is width of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_HEIGHT - is height of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_FONT_SIZE - is font size of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: scaled pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_FOCUSABLE - Optional
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is focusable.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_HINT - Optional
        Type: String

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_COLOR - Optional
        Type : String
        Format: ARGB
        Example:
        "ffffffff" which represent the opaque white color.
        "cc00ff00" which means the green color with 20% transparent.

        About how to send output to BroadPOS, see EntryRequest.ACTION_SECURITY_AREA for details.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_ENTER_PIN

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_ENTER_PIN
        Activity Action: ENTER PIN
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.ENTER_PIN"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE - is trans name.
        Type: String
        Example: "CREDIT SALE"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE - is transaction mode.
        Type: String
        See TransMode for details

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT -
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_CURRENCY - is currency type.
        Type: String
        Default value: CurrencyType.USD
        Optional.

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TOTAL_AMOUNT - is total amount
        Type: Long
        Optional.

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_IS_ONLINE_PIN -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PIN_STYLES -
        Type: String
        see PinStyles for details

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PIN_RANGE - is length limit for PIN
        Type: String
        It defines valid length of PIN and enumerates all possible lengths of PIN. "," will be used to separate each number of length.
        Example:
        If value is "0,4,6", it means NO PIN, or 4 or 6 digits of PIN are allowed.
        So, if value start with "0,", you could show a message "Press OK to Bypass PIN".

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_IS_EXTERNAL_PINPAD - tells the type of PIN PAD
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE means BroadPOS using external PIN PAD (like SP30S).

        If you would like to use your PIN PAD layout, see EntryRequest.ACTION_SET_PIN_KEY_LAYOUT for details.
        BroadPOS does not care about the location of PIN INPUT BOX, however you have to set security area to BroadPOS after UI is ready.
        BroadPOS will start PIN entry process after receive broadcast EntryRequest.ACTION_SECURITY_AREA

        Example code: 
                 Bundle bundle = new Bundle();
         bundle.putString(EntryRequest.PARAM_ACTION, SecurityEntry.ACTION_ENTER_PIN);

         Intent intent = new Intent(EntryRequest.ACTION_SECURITY_AREA);
         intent.putExtras(bundle);
         intent.setPackage(packageName);
         requireContext().sendBroadcast(intent);
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_ENTER_VCODE

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_ENTER_VCODE
        Activity Action: Enter VCode/CVV
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.ENTER_CVV"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE - is trans name.
        Type: String
        Example: "CREDIT SALE"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE - is transaction mode.
        Type: String
        See TransMode for details

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT -
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_VCODE_NAME -
        see VCodeName

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_X - is X coordinate of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_Y - is Y coordinate of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_WIDTH - is width of input box
        Type: Integer

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_HEIGHT - is height of input box

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_FONT_SIZE - is font size of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: scaled pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_FOCUSABLE - Optional
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is focusable.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_HINT - Optional
        Type: String

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_COLOR - Optional
        Type : String
        Format: ARGB
        Example:
        "ffffffff" which represent the opaque white color.
        "cc00ff00" which means the green color with 20% transparent.

        About how to send output to BroadPOS, see EntryRequest.ACTION_SECURITY_AREA for details.

      • ACTION_ENTER_CARD_LAST_4_DIGITS

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_ENTER_CARD_LAST_4_DIGITS
        Activity Action: Enter Last 4 Digits of Card
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.ENTER_CARD_LAST_4_DIGITS"

        Used when secure card feature is enabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE - is the package name of caller.
        Type: String

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE - is trans name.
        Type: String
        Example: "CREDIT SALE"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE - is transaction mode.
        Type: String
        See TransMode for details

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE - Message shown on UI
        Type: String
        It is optional. Reversed if some BroadPOS app prefer customized message.

        If EntryExtraData.PARAM_MESSAGE - exist, recommend display it.
        Of course, you can display your own message, Like:
        "Please Enter Last 4 Digits"

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT -
        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_X - is X coordinate of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_Y - is Y coordinate of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_WIDTH - is width of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_HEIGHT - is height of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_FONT_SIZE - is font size of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: scaled pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_FOCUSABLE - Optional
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is focusable.

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_HINT - Optional
        Type: String

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_COLOR - Optional
        Type : String
        Format: ARGB
        Example:
        "ffffffff" which represent the opaque white color.
        "cc00ff00" which means the green color with 20% transparent.

        About how to send output to BroadPOS, see EntryRequest.ACTION_SECURITY_AREA for details.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Activity Action: Enter All Digits of Card
        "com.pax.us.pay.action.ENTER_CARD_ALL_DIGITS"

        Of course, you can display your own message, Like:
        "Please Enter All Digits"

        Type: Long
        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.

        Unit: pixel

        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_WIDTH - is width of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_HEIGHT - is height of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_MERCHANT_NAME is merchant name.

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ADMIN_PASSWORD_TYPE is password type.
        Type: String
        See AdminPasswordType for details

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_X - is X coordinate of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        Output: EntryRequest.PARAM_Y - is Y coordinate of input box
        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_MANAGE_INPUT_ACCOUNT

        Unit: ms
        Default is 30000.
        For reference only, BroadPOS handles timeout.

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_AMOUNT_MESSAGE Amount Message. Optional.

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_SWIPE -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Input: EntryExtraData.PARAM_ENABLE_INSERT -
        Type: Boolean
        TRUE is enabled. FALSE is disabled

        Type: Integer
        Unit: pixel
